title: "CV"

I am a researcher and economist specializing in international trade and climate change. Currently, I am affiliated with the Austrian Institute of Economic Research and the Kiel Institute for the World Economy. My academic background includes a Master of Science in Agricultural Economics from Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin and ongoing doctoral studies in Quantitative Economics at Christian-Albrechts-Universität zu Kiel. I have also had the privilege of being a Visiting Ph.D. Student at the University of California, Berkeley. From 2022 to 2024, I am a Fellow of the Joachem-Herz Foundation.
